N_bursts_cycle_chd.description: Number of bursts in a tracking cycle

N_ku_pulses_burst_chd.description: Number of Ku-band pulses per burst

N_samples_sar_chd.description: Number of samples per each SAR pulse

fai_shift_number_chd.description: Number of fai shifts to complete one sample in LRM and SAR science waveforms

rfu_rx_gain_ground_chd.description: Combination of RFU gains in the receiving chain

onboard_proc_sar_raw_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the SAR Raw digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta)

power_tx_ant_ku_chd.description: Antenna SSPA RF Peak Transmitted Power in Ku band

alt_freq_multiplier_chd.description: Factor to convert from USO frequency to altimeter frequency

pri_T0_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts PRI to T0 units

cai_cor2_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts CAI to COR2 units

h0_cor2_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts HO to COR2 units

T0_h0_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts T0 to H0 units

i_sample_start_chd.description: The RMC ASIC truncates the time domain burst and keeps only the range gates with indexes going from (i_sample_start_chd) to (i_sample_start_chd + N_samples_sar_chd/2-1)
